subject: AUDIT: userDefaults contains ONLY 2 dead fields - safe to deprecate
body:
Team,

Completed full audit of userDefaults across all 45 users.

## FINDINGS

**userDefaults contains exactly 2 fields for ALL users:**

| Field | Values Found | Actually Used? |
|-------|--------------|----------------|
| defaultZoomRange | 50 or 200 | NO - duplicates mapCenter.radiusMiles |
| useCenterLocation | always false | NO - never true, never read by any code |

**0 users have any additional fields.**

## SAMPLE DATA

```javascript
// Toby
{ defaultZoomRange: 50, useCenterLocation: false }

// Andi
{ defaultZoomRange: 50, useCenterLocation: false }

// Everyone else
{ defaultZoomRange: 50|200, useCenterLocation: false }
```

## CONCLUSION

userDefaults is 100% dead code:
- Frontend only checks if object EXISTS (gate check)
- Values are NEVER read
- mapCenter has all the actual location data

**Safe to deprecate** when Atlas approves.

â€” Fulton
